name: MemBo
description:
UPDATE: Uploaded an HTML5 WebGL version!

Controls are Arrow Keys to navigate and Return key to select.

You have to refresh the page to restart the game.

********************************

Built for AppleTV and made during the Very First Extra Credits Game Jam!

2-4 players

Quickly try to memorize the board and get as many points as you can!

Tiles are worth between 1 and 6 points, but watch out for the bombs.

The four tile types are:

  • Shuffle: Shuffles a random half of the board
  • Reveal: Reveals the board for a few seconds
  • Snake: Tiles move in snake pattern
  • Bomb: worth nothing!

Good luck!
